definition: طفح ṭafaḥa a (ṭafḥ, طفوح ṭufūḥ) to flow over, run over, overflow (ب with, also, e.g., the heart with generosity, etc.); to cause to overflow (ب e.g., the milk) II to fill to overflowing, fill to the brim (هـ a vessel); to overfill (هـ s.th.) IV = II طفح ṭafḥ superabundance, repletion; skin eruption, rash, exanthema (med.) طفح ṭāfiḥ flowing over, running over, brimful, replete, overfull, filled to overflowing
